name: Missed target
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "Missed target" do
    expected = 0
    actual = score -9.0 9.0
    label "expected" expected
    label "actual" actual
    ensureEqual expected actual

name: On the outer circle
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "On the outer circle" do
    expected = 1
    actual = score 0.0 10.0
    label "expected" expected
    label "actual" actual
    ensureEqual expected actual

name: On the middle circle
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "On the middle circle" do
    expected = 5
    actual = score -5.0 0.0
    label "expected" expected
    label "actual" actual
    ensureEqual expected actual

name: On the inner circle
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "On the inner circle" do
    expected = 10
    actual = score 0.0 -1.0
    label "expected" expected
    label "actual" actual
    ensureEqual expected actual

name: Exactly on centre
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "Exactly on centre" do
    expected = 10
    actual = score 0.0 0.0
    label "expected" expected
    label "actual" actual
    ensureEqual expected actual

test_code:
verify do
  labeled "Near the centre" do
    expected = 10
    actual = score -0.1 -0.1
    label "expected" expected
    label "actual" actual
    ensureEqual expected actual

name: Asymmetric position between the inner and middle circles
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "Asymmetric position between the inner and middle circles" do
    expected = 5
    actual = score 0.5 -4.0
    label "expected" expected
    label "actual" actual
    ensureEqual expected actual
